name: Habitat Defense
description:
The newly constructed habitat station has ended up inside an asteroid field! With no reinforcements available, you must purchase and upgrade weapons to defend the Colony from certain doom. Those things ain't cheap!

Controls:

  •  A,D / Left,Right arrow To move
  •  Mouse to aim and shoot your weapon
  •  1 - 3 / Mousewheel to swap between weapons
  •  B To open the shop
  • Esc to open the options menu

Notes:

Spoiler warning?
  • There are 9 levels in total
  • Shield blocks Radiation and laser bolts
  • Explosions help against big rocks
